name: No One Is Gonna Stop You (from naming your game the same as the prompt)
name_original: No One Is Gonna Stop You (from naming your game the same as the prompt)
description:
A unbeatable game by traditional means.

Controls:
> move - wasd
> attack - space
> mild mouse clicking

Hot Keys:

> F4 - toggle full screen
> F6 - master volume down
> F7 - master volume up
> Delete - toggle FPS

This game uses assets from this amazing artist: 
https://0x72.itch.io/

English to Shakespeare translator:
https://lingojam.com/EnglishtoShakespearean

SFX and BGM files are completely free to use for any purpose (including commercial) other than reselling or claiming as your own as long as you give me credit.
